document_data.name: Filro
document_data.mainbody:
'''Filro''' the Forgotten was a [[drow]] who lived alone in the [[Underdark]] in a region beneath the [[Sword Coast]].

{{Quote|Protector...guardian of the Adamantine Forge? From magma rose, only in magma destroyed. Hot. Hammer. HOT. HAMMER!|Excerpt from Filro's journal.}}
document_data.Activities: Filro set himself up in a little makeshift hovel in a rocky outcropping, accessible by the massive branch of a nearby [[sussur]] tree. There, he kept a simple bedroll and a stack of [[book]]s.
document_data.Possessions: He carried with him a simple [[quarterstaff]] and several [[spell]] [[scroll]]s. More notably, however, he carried one of the three pieces of the powerful magic staff â€“ ''[[Mourning Frost]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Filro kept along with him a quartet of [[hook horror]] guardians.
document_data.History: Sometime in or before the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Filro was among the three drow who began to search out the legendary [[Adamantine Forge]] in the Underdark underneath the [[Western Heartlands]], to the point of obsession. At one point in his search, Filro was forsaken by his companions, [[Xargrim]] and [[Dhourn Ba'Tol]], and was left to die. A pack of hook horrors found the lost drow man and fed him [[gnome|gnomish]] flesh, nursing him back to health. By 1492 DR, Filro lost his sanity and lived as a hermit alongside his hook horror pack.
